name: specweave
description: SpecWeave - Spec-Driven Development Framework. PM-led planning, intelligent model selection, living documentation, multi-tool support.

plugins.name: specweave
plugins.description: SpecWeave framework - increment lifecycle, living docs, PM-led planning

plugins.name: specweave-github
plugins.description: GitHub integration - bidirectional sync, issue tracking, task management

plugins.name: specweave-jira
plugins.description: JIRA integration - bidirectional sync with epics/stories

plugins.name: specweave-ado
plugins.description: Azure DevOps integration - bidirectional sync with work items

plugins.name: specweave-kubernetes
plugins.description: Kubernetes deployment - K8s manifests, Helm charts, GitOps

plugins.name: specweave-infrastructure
plugins.description: Cloud infrastructure - Hetzner, Prometheus, Grafana, monitoring

plugins.name: specweave-backend
plugins.description: Backend development - Node.js, Python, .NET, REST APIs

plugins.name: specweave-payments
plugins.description: Payment processing - Stripe, PayPal, billing, PCI compliance

plugins.name: specweave-ml
plugins.description: Machine learning - ML pipelines, training, deployment

plugins.name: specweave-docs-preview
plugins.description: Interactive documentation preview - Launch Docusaurus dev server with hot reload, auto-generated sidebar, Mermaid diagrams. Build static sites for deployment.

plugins.name: specweave-diagrams
plugins.description: Architecture diagrams - Mermaid, C4 Model, sequence, ER diagrams

plugins.name: specweave-release
plugins.description: Release management - version alignment, RC workflows, multi-repo coordination, semantic versioning

plugins.name: specweave-mobile
plugins.description: React Native & Expo mobile development - environment setup, debugging, performance optimization, native modules, testing, Metro bundler configuration

plugins.name: specweave-kafka
plugins.description: Apache Kafka event streaming integration with MCP servers, CLI tools (kcat), Terraform modules, and comprehensive observability stack

plugins.name: specweave-kafka-streams
plugins.description: Kafka Streams library integration - Stream processing with Java/Kotlin, topology patterns, state stores, windowing, joins, and testing frameworks

plugins.name: specweave-confluent
plugins.description: Confluent Cloud integration - Schema Registry, ksqlDB, Kafka Connect, Flink, stream processing, and enterprise Kafka features

plugins.name: specweave-n8n
plugins.description: n8n workflow automation integration with Kafka - Event-driven workflows, Kafka triggers, producers, consumers, and workflow patterns for no-code/low-code event processing
